Properties.ProtectedString:
Tool = script.Parent
local stillEquipped = false
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end print("Setting Mouse to wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)

local Tool = script.Parent local Brain = Tool.Handle
Tool.Enabled = true
local myCharacter local numberOfBrains local screenGui local buzzer
local brainCFrame
local summoner
function onActivated() if not Tool.Enabled then return end numberOfBrains = Tool:FindFirstChild("NumberOfBrains") if numberOfBrains then if numberOfBrains.Value <= 0 then buzzer = Tool:FindFirstChild("NoBrainsBuzzer") if buzzer then buzzer:Play() end return end end numberOfBrains.Value = numberOfBrains.Value - 1 Tool.Enabled = false myCharacter = Tool.Parent local myTorso = myCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") if not myTorso then return end local myPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(myCharacter) if not myPlayer then return end
local clonedBrain = Brain:Clone()
clonedBrain.Transparency = 0.5
bodyGyro = Instance.new("BodyGyro") bodyGyro.P = 10000 bodyGyro.maxTorque = Vector3.new(bodyGyro.P, bodyGyro.P, bodyGyro.P) bodyGyro.cframe = (myTorso.CFrame + (myTorso.CFrame.lookVector * 2.0)) * CFrame.Angles(-math.pi/2, 0, 0) bodyGyro.Parent = clonedBrain
clonedBrain.Parent = Workspace clonedBrain.CanCollide = true Brain.Transparency = 1.0
local cloneScript = Tool.SummonScript:Clone() cloneScript.Parent = clonedBrain
summoner = cloneScript:FindFirstChild("Summoner") if summoner then summoner.Value = myCharacter end
cloneScript.Disabled = false
local creatorTag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creatorTag.Value = myPlayer creatorTag.Name = "creator" creatorTag.Parent = clonedBrain
wait(2.0) Brain.Transparency = 0.0 Tool.Enabled = true end
function onEquipped() myCharacter = Tool.Parent myPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(myCharacter)
numberOfBrains = Tool:FindFirstChild("NumberOfBrains")
screenGui = Instance.new("ScreenGui") screenGui.Name = "TrapsGui" if myPlayer then screenGui.Parent = myPlayer.PlayerGui end frame = Instance.new("Frame") frame.Name = "TrapContainer" frame.Position = UDim2.new(0, 0, 0.75, 0) frame.Size = UDim2.new(0, 75, 0, 75) frame.Parent = screenGui frame.BackgroundTransparency = 1.0
image = Instance.new("ImageLabel") image.Name = "Brain" image.Image = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=64570445" image.Parent = frame image.Size = UDim2.new(0, 75, 0, 75) image.BackgroundTransparency = 1.0
text = Instance.new("TextLabel") if numberOfBrains then text.Text = numberOfBrains.Value end
numberOfBrains.Changed:connect(function() text.Text = numberOfBrains.Value end) text.Position = UDim2.new(0.75, 0, 0.75, 0) text.Size = UDim2.new(0.5, 0, 0.5, 0) text.Parent = frame text.BackgroundTransparency = 1.0 text.TextColor = BrickColor.new("Bright red") text.FontSize = 7 end
function onUnequipped() Brain.Transparency = 0.0 if screenGui then screenGui:Remove() end end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)

wait(2.0)
local Brain = script.Parent
while script:FindFirstChild("Summoner") == nil do wait() end
local summoner = script.Summoner summoner = script.Summoner.Value
if summoner == nil then script:Remove() end
local targetEnemyTorso = nil local targetEnemyHumanoid = nil
local checkAOE = Vector3.new(14, 14, 14)
local zombie = game:GetService("InsertService"):LoadAsset(64630774) if zombie then zombie = zombie:GetChildren()[1] end
if zombie == nil then Brain:Remove() end
local zombieHumanoid = zombie:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") local zombieTorso = zombie:FindFirstChild("Torso")
while zombieHumanoid.Health < 250 do zombieHumanoid.Health = 250 wait() end
while targetEnemyTorso == nil do local parts = game.Workspace:FindPartsInRegion3(Region3.new(Brain.Position - checkAOE, Brain.Position + checkAOE), summoner, 100) for i = 1, #parts do if parts[i] and parts[i].Parent then local character = parts[i].Parent local humanoid = character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") local torso = character:FindFirstChild("Torso") if character ~= zombie and humanoid ~= nil and torso ~= nil then targetEnemyTorso = torso targetEnemyHumanoid = humanoid end end end wait(1.0) end
zombie.Parent = game.Workspace zombie:MoveTo(Brain.Position)
function bite(hit) if hit and hit.Parent then local humanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid then humanoid:TakeDamage(15) end end end
zombieTorso.Touched:connect(bite)
local duration = 20.0
while duration > 0 and targetEnemyHumanoid.Health > 0 and zombieHumanoid and zombieTorso do local ray = game.Workspace:FindPartOnRay(Ray.new(zombieTorso.Position + Vector3.new(0, -2, 0), zombieTorso.CFrame.lookVector * 3.0), nil) if ray then zombieHumanoid.Jump = true end if targetEnemyTorso then zombieHumanoid:MoveTo(targetEnemyTorso.Position, targetEnemyTorso) end duration = duration - wait(0.1) wait(0.1) end
wait(2.0)
if zombie then zombie:Remove() end if Brain then Brain:Remove() end
